projects.title: Weather App
projects.description: iOS weather app built with SwiftUI, provides real-time current condition and a 7-day forecast based on the user's location. It utilizes CoreLocation framework to detect the user's position and display local weather data with weather icons for an enchaned visual experience.
projects.longDescription: Integrates Open-Meteo API for accurate weather data, with JSON decoding for API response parsing. It follows MVVM architecture pattern for clean code separation and maintainability.

projects.title: Online Connect Four
projects.description: Real-time multiplayer Connect Four game with player registration, lobby system and gameinvitations.
projects.longDescription: Features Firebase Firestore integration for real-time synchronization, win detection algorithms, and persistent player data storage.

projects.title: ToDo List App
projects.description: todo list app with category-based organization and filtering system built in SwiftUI. Features todo creation and completion tracking, category assignment (Work, Personal, School), dynamic filtering by category, and swipe-to-delete functionality with persistent state management..

projects.title: Notes App
projects.description: Complete task management app with CRUD operations, form validation, and navigation built using Jetpack Compose.
projects.longDescription: Implements Material Design 3 components with dynamic theming, comprehensive input validation (title length, content limits), and responsive UI that adapts to different screen sizes and content lengths.
